acknowledgements.para: From Mark I would like to express gratitude to my editors, co-authors, colleagues, and bosses who shared the thorny path to working clusters - with the hope to make it less thorny for those who follow. Seriously, folks, Hadoop is hard, and Big Data is tough, and there are many related products and skills that you need to master. Therefore, have fun, provide your feedback, and I hope you will find the book entertaining.

"The author's opinions do not necessarily coincide with his point of view." -
Victor Pelevin, "Generation P"
From Sujee To the kind souls who helped me along the way
